author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Test service had a delay of 5s while the test had a timeout of 5s, there's a small window where the delay expires before the timeout invalidating the test.
Fix is to increase the delay to 6s allowing for the timeout to succeed.

VSCode removed a bunch of trailing whitespace.

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).

-->
title: increase timing on test service for webcmdlet timeout test to make it more robust
